Title: IT Specialist Missionary
Subtitle: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
Description Brief: Developed applications to allow hundreds of missionaries to report weekly statistics and data of their areas.
Description Long: Created and coded a sophisticated reporting system using Google Sheets and Google Apps Script, resulting in a 1000% increase in missionary productivity. Authored technology guides, reports, and requests to enhance technology utilization.

Header Image.alt: Header image for the IT Specialist Missionary position

Title: Team Captain
Subtitle: Mechanical Dragons (FRC 5974)
Description Brief: Directed my high school's robotics team with an emphasis on training new members to grow into leadership roles.
Description Long: Led high school robotics team of 30 students as Team Captain, focusing on leadership development and training new team members. Fostered a culture of openness and learning, resulting in significant team success in the FIRST Robotics Competition, achieving the second most successful year.

Header Image.alt: Header image for the Team Captain position

Title: Team Programing Lead
Subtitle: Mechanical Dragons (FRC 5974)
Description Brief: Delegated massive programming projects into smaller projects and organized pairs of students to accomplish each project.
Description Long: Spearheaded the programming division for three years, training numerous programmers to code efficiently for robot functionalities. Engineered a fast and efficient codebase, contributing to the team's highest-performing year with a playoff appearance in the Utah regional. Consistently secured the highest amount of fundraising contributions, playing a key role in annual fundraising efforts ranging from $10,000 to $15,000.

Header Image.alt: Header image for the Team Programming Lead position
